programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin
programme.desc: Marissa and Ellice are best friends who hail from different worlds: Ellice is from an influential family, while Marissa is a simple lass living with her mother Lucing. The two are inseparable until one night, a gruesome crime changes their destinies.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Two strangers' lives become entwined after they both return from apparent death due to a road crash.

programme.title: The Breakup Playlist
programme.desc: What if you have a dream, and it leads you to love? Trixie, a law student and hopeful musician, catches the attention of rock star Gino Avila at a music camp. He invites her to be part of his band. Trixie and Gino's connection through music develops into something more.

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba

programme.title: Can't Buy Me Love
programme.desc: A young man gets entangled in a kidnap-for-ransom situation. He offers the kidnappers all his hard-earned money to save the victim, believing that her wealthy Filipino-Chinese family could easily repay him, or so he thought.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Sins Of The Father
programme.desc: This crime thriller mystery drama sheds light on the plight of scam victims, and is centred around a man named Samuel, whose life is shattered by a scam involving his father.

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 22
programme.desc:
A story of a couple who preserves the family 
bakery business legacy from closure. Now the 
couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the 
business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 12
programme.desc:
‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

business. Are the parents willing to accept change 
and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: For the Love ep 3
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 6
programme.desc: Family and fate intertwine in this dark story of old rituals and a parallel shadow universe where sacrifices of blood ensures that the small town of Quatro Santo remains wealthy and prosperous. A mother and daughter with old ties return to the place where their ancestors once tried to flee, only to find themselves trying to escape a darker destiny.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 120
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 2
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 6
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: For the Love ep 3
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 6
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally “kills” Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: An upcoming family-oriented drama series starring Carmina Villaroel, Cassy Legaspi, Mavy Legaspi, Zoren Legaspi .

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.desc: Roi Vinzon attained full stardom in Kapitan Tumba, the true-to-life controversial story of Capt. Jose Huevos of Bulacan.

programme.title: D' Godson
programme.desc: A parody of the film The Godfather (1972). A young boy (Niño Muhlach) wants to follow the footsteps of his godfather as a mafia boss by imitating his actions and behavior.

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Pusoy Dos
programme.desc: It is non-stop laughter as Janno Gibbs and Dennis Padilla got together as Billy and Jack, modern-day Robin Hoods who engaged in petty scums to earn money for the upkeep of a day care center for indigent children.

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Ang Paghihiganti Ni David Burdado
programme.desc: After the murder of his parents, the surviving son vows to take the law into his hands.

programme.title: Apoy Sa Puso
programme.desc: This is a love story as torrid and as passionate as a smouldering volcano.

programme.title: Campus Girls
programme.desc: Four girls began college together. Along with this new phase in their lives also came major upheavals which nearly wrecked their friendship. The girls discovered that theirs was not a perfect world but there was always hope for tomorrow.

programme.title: Bangkay Mo Akong Hahakbangan
programme.desc: Join the King of Stunts, Dante Varona, on this deadly game on hide and seek and of vengeance and justice.

programme.title: Bahala Na Vs Sputnik
programme.desc: \"Bahala na\" and \"Sigue-Sigue Sputnik\" are two of the most wanted gangs decades ago. They fought more than any other notorious criminals. They fear no law and life for them is a life of violence. They have no Lords other than their brotherhood until their world self-destructed.

programme.title: Bangers
programme.desc: Lolo Hop and his grandsons, Hip and Hap, went to the big city to investigate the mysterious death of their brother, Hep. Lolo Hop, Hip and Hap had no idea of what they were getting into but the result was incredibly hilarious.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.

programme.title: SPO1 Don Juan (Da Dancing Policeman)
programme.desc: Leo Martinez is a policeman who directs traffic with choreographed dance movements. Unknown to him he has a look-alike who takes advantage of his popularity with motorists by directing traffic for get-away cars during robberies.

programme.title: Col. Billy Bibit Story (Ram)
programme.desc: The life story of Col. Billy Bibit, one of the real-life heroes of the EDSA Revolution came to the screen with Rommel Padilla in the title role. The film chronicles Bibit's life from his days as a cadet in the military academy to his exploits as a young officer.

programme.title: Paano Tatakasan Ang Bukas?
programme.desc: Desiree and Gilbert are in love but no one seems to believe it.

programme.title: Ang Alamat Ni Julian Makabayan
programme.desc: Set when the Philippines is still under the Spanish rule and Filipinos are considered slaves in their own country. This is the story of Julian Makabayan, a peasant who dared to stand up against the authority and for his rights.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit Ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Judge Max Asuncion, Hukom Bitay
programme.desc: Based on the real-life adventures of Judge Max Asuncion who was known as a stickler for the law and as a man who got death threats for breakfast.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as \"bad boy\" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.
